    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3090</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Drawing the story of cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen der Geschichte von Aschenputtel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dessin de l'histoire de Cendrillon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhando a história de cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissipare la storia di cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός της ιστορίας του cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trazar la historia de cinderella</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an art activity where the student express in drawing what they understood from reading Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">graphic expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fairy tales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses eine kunstaktivität in der der 
Kursteilnehmer ist, der wenn es zeichnet ausdrücklich ist, was sie 
vom Messwert Aschenputtel verstanden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité d'art où l'étudiant exprès
en dessinant ce qu'ils ont compris de la lecture Cendrillon</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade da arte onde o estudante 
expresso em desenhar o que compreenderam da leitura Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività di arte dove l'allievo 
espresso nel dissipare che cosa hanno capito da lettura Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα τέχνης όπου ο 
σπουδαστής σαφής στο σχέδιο τι κατάλαβαν από την ανάγνωση 
Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Está una actividad esto del arte donde el 
estudiante expreso en trazar lo que entendían de la lectura 
Cinderella</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
